Author: p4prik4
Text: gotta find stuff to distract u and keep busy.  eat foods that you know will feed you well, cut back on foods that cause cravings imo sugar and wheat often times comfort foods  maybe take multivitamin such that youll know your body has all its daily nutrients so no reason to keep eating   maybe eat for 30mins (set timer) then force urself to go out for a walk and get fresh air, once digested somewhat say 15-20 mins later maybe do something tougher like pushups  take ur mind body into a different zone
